text:
Scott Disick Reunites With Chloe Bartoli in Cannes as Bella Thorne Loses Interest

Well, that was fast. On Thursday, Scott Disick, 34, was photographed near his luxury villa in Cannes, walking with his arm around Chloe Bartoli, 26, — the same woman he was seen looking…

http://ift.tt/2qWzjB2
